articles.title: Asus launches AMD Ryzen 7000 series laptops: Price, features and more - Times of India
articles.description: Taiwanese tech giant, Asus has expanded its consumer notebook lineup with new AMD Ryzen 7000 series-powered laptops in the Indian market.

articles.content: Surekha Yadav, Asia's first woman loco pilot, has now become the first female to operate the newly-introduced semi-high speed Vande Bharat Express train, the Central Railways said. On Monday, she ach… [+1534 chars]
